TopicTitle: How do you read ore scanners

Articles.Content: Ok. To test ore scanners I built one and put it into Kerbin polar orbit, but how in the world am I suppose to read the thing? All the continents just light up.

Read through [this thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/117227-Resource-Mining-Impressions-and-Questions), specifically the posts by RoverDude, for a good explanation of how it all works.
Places with thicker colors have more ore, less thick means less ore.
